description:
Here is a very special treat... Since I started posting our extra weekly Casting Couch updates people have been asking about the first 5 "test" shoots that Matt & I did before the full approval. Well up until today, they were only available on KOD... Till today....

Anja is an Internet virgin, and wants to work for Kink.com. So we scheduled an interview, filmed it, tied her up and made her cum. After all, we have to know if she can handle a full-on shoot, don't we?

So enjoy this Internet virgin's first debut -- we did.
title: Casting Couch 2
